reviews.text: 755 Davis Blvd, Southlake, TX 76092 Tired of sharing your patio with buzzing intruders? 🦟 Our custom-screened patio enclosures create a beautiful, bug-free oasis so you can enjoy every warm Texas evening without a single bite. Imagine dinner, relaxation, and memory-making — all in peaceful, pest-free comfort!

Company does not honor the lifetime warranty and will not be there for the long haul.  Purchased solar screens back in 2009 and the invoice states "all prices include lifetime warranty (screen material, frame and workmanship)". We did have the opportunity to meet with you several years ago to provide an estimate for re-rolling your screens and enclosing your patio. At that time, there was no mention of a warranty

Completed screen install of whole house JAN2020. Very pleased with the finished product. Service was very professional. Justin was constantly on it providing recurring proactive updates every step of the way. Recommended and would partner with again. Response from the owner 5 years ago Thank you so much for your review. We appreciate your business very much. Thank you for choosing us as your screen provider.
I was very pleased with the ease of using American Solar Screens. It was simple to order and they were quick to install. Pricing was fair.
